comment:
/**
 * ---
 * category: utilities
 * ---
 * Converts a hyphenated or camel cased string to pascal case
 *
 * Example inputs:
 *  - 'foo-bar'
 *  - 'baz-qux'
 *
 * Example outputs:
 *  - 'FooBar'
 *  - 'BazQux'
 *
 * @module pascalize
 * @param {String} str
 * @returns {String} Returns pascal cased string
 */
description:
Converts a hyphenated or camel cased string to pascal case

Example inputs:
 - 'foo-bar'
 - 'baz-qux'

Example outputs:
 - 'FooBar'
 - 'BazQux'
name: pascalize
title: pascalize
